The WHO India Country Cooperation Strategy 2019-23 (CCS) was introduced in October. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The CCS is focused on the environmentally friendly automobile sector.
  2. The WHO is to cooperate with the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare for the CCS implementation.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The CCS is focused on the health sector. Its objectives include protection against health emergencies, achievement of universal health care, addressing the health determinants and improve Indiaâ€™s standing in global health scenario. The strategy will build on pre-existing programs like Ayushman Bharat and the National Viral Hepatitis Program/ Statement 2 is correct: Under the CCS, the WHO will collaborate with the health and family welfare ministry and also its associated ministries. The CCS will provide the roadmap for this cooperation. It includes both identification of the issues and also addressing of the same.
